name: Jam Space: Pocketstudio
description: Jam Space: PocketStudio brings the power of a recording studio with you in your pocket on your Nintendo DSi. You can compose tracks, jot down ideas and be musical wherever you are, so you never have to miss that moment of inspiration ever again. There are two modes you can choose from in JS: PocketStudio. You can choose the ‘quick jam’ mode which will allow you to lay down tracks quickly and easily using natural instrument interfaces. This is a great mode if you’ve got a little melody you want to record and want to get it down quickly. In ‘Studio’ mode, you have access to a fully-featured MIDI editor that will allow you to tweak and hone your compositions to a professional level! If you want to dig deep and really work on that masterpiece, this is the mode for you.
